summary: Provides a Home Assistant sensor platform that connects to a Glances service on a host, retrieves various system statistics via its REST API, and exposes each selected metric as an individual sensor entity with appropriate name, icon, unit and availability, updating the data at a throttled interval.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to monitor remote system health (CPU, memory, disk, network, temperature, etc.) through Glances without manual scripting, integrating the data into the Home Assistant dashboard and automations.
